title: Dosent download
body: When i try to download Leauge of legends it says '' ETA 0 Mins - 0.0 MB / 0.0 MB '' Help please.

replies.body: It's possible that your network hasn't been able to establish a solid link with the download servers if it hasn't moved whatsoever. I'd first try switching to ethernet of course for more stability, but also check to make sure your firewalls or antivirus' aren't blocking it! Add exceptions to those if you could, or just disable them temporarily to see if that helps. Check out [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) if you're having trouble with those steps.
